text.div:
Contract Actor Role Codes

This value set includes sample Contract Actor Role codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://www.hl7.org/fhir/contractactorrole defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
practitioner PractitionerSomeone who provides health care related services to people or animals including both clinical and support services.
patient PatientA receiver, human or animal, of health care related goods and services.

name: Contract Actor Role Codes
description: This value set includes sample Contract Actor Role codes.

concept.definition: Someone who provides health care related services to people or animals including both clinical and support services.
A receiver, human or animal, of health care related goods and services.
